sentences.english: What does it say on the waiting room wall in the hospital?
You have a party at home in the evening.

sentences.finnish: Päivällä sinä olet töissä ja sinun poikaystävä siivoa kotona.
sentences.english: During the day you are at work and your boyfriend is cleaning at home.
What do you say to him?
Bake a cake and make food.

sentences.finnish: Sinun ystävä on sairas. Hänellä on influenssa. Mitä sanot hänelle?
sentences.english: Your friend is sick. He has the flu. What do you say to him?

sentences.finnish: Juo paljon ja nuku. Soita töihin. Älä urheile! Älä mene töihin.
sentences.english: Drink a lot and sleep. Call work. Don't exercise! Don't go to work.
